Key: Mm... *sigh* Huh, is it morning already?
I have today off, so I want to sleep in...
Don't give me that crap. Gosh...

(I don't see where Kotori went...
Oh no, is she going to dropkick me again?!)

If you're not going to get up, then maybe
I can sleep with you.
Scoot over. I don't have room.
I-I'll wake up! I'll get up!
It's fine. You can go back to bed.

Man, that was more startling than her
usual dropkicks.
Beats me. They all left this morning.
Just a bit tired. That's all. I'm fine.

If you can give me some energy, then I'll
be feeling better in no time.
Hey, Shido. I have a favor to ask you.

I'll work hard for you, Shido. So... give me
the energy I need to keep going.
Energy... How am I supposed to do that?
You can. I mean, you've said as much before.
Oh. I did say that, didn't I?

Yesterday, I felt a little better when you
carried me home, so would you mind doing
me another favor? Please, Shido.

Okay. G-Got it. So, you want me to give you
another piggyback ride?

That's not what I'm referring to. I want...
to do something else today.

The closer you are to me, the calmer I
feel. It rejuvenates me.
What's the matter? Can't you do it?

Shido? Please, give me a little energy.
Then, I can... I can do better.
You were so nice to me yesterday.

I can give you all the piggy back rides you
want, but today, you're...

I was just teasing. Goodness. You took me
so seriously. This is why people with sister
complexes are so weird.
Look how worked up you got. Hehe.
Man, if only you could've seen your face.
Anyways, I'm going to go back to sleep.

I'm exhausted. Just call me when it's time
to eat. Good night.

What's going on with her? She's been joking
around with me a lot lately.

I wonder if she's okay. She mentioned that
she's tired, so maybe I should cancel our date
and stay home.

It's just Kotori and me for dinner tonight.
First time in a while. Supposedly, Tohka and
Yoshino have physicals this weekend.

(Reine-san's the one who suggested it. Since
the Spirits are unstable, they need to schedule
physicals for Ratatoskr to collect data.)

Okay, Kotori. She should be awake now. Maybe
I can let her know. I'm sure she's hungry.
Kotori...? You still asleep? I'm coming in.

Don't open the door. Wait. Are you wearing
your white ribbons?
Yeah. You got a problem with that?

Oh, no. It's time for dinner. It's just the two
of us, so I made your favorites.

Oh, that's wonderful! Let's head down
there, Onii-chan!
Hey, make sure to chew, okay?
Awesome. Have as much as you’d like.
Huh? What are you talking about?
Not as far as I know!

H-Hey, listen. Or do you need the black ribbons
to talk?

Hang on. Do you have no idea what I'm talking
about?

*yawn* I'm sleepy again. I'm totally stuffed,
so I'm going back to bed!

You slept practically all afternoon. Wait, that's
not the point. Hey, Kotori?
Kotori. Must be some kind of bad joke.

But ever since Kotori stopped wearing her
black ribbons... What's going on in her head?
I don't understand her.

Oh well. I'm sure by tomorrow she'll be back
to her usual self.

She will, won't she? She'll be the usual Kotori,
and she's going to taunt me.

She said she was just teasing today. It was
all a bad dream.
